essentials:
• creamy or hydrating formulas that provide gentle cleansing without drying out the skin.
  • Avoid Harsh Ingredients(no sulphates no alcohol no fragrance).
  • pH-Balanced Formulas and Mild Cleansing Agents.
description:
Cetaphil Gentle Cleanser provides 48 hours of hydration with hydrating glycerin and skin essential vitamins B5 (panthenol) and B3 (niacinamide) and soap free, fragrance free, non foaming.

Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel CleanserLeaves skin refreshingly clean and touchable supple every time you cleanse Helps maintain the skin’s moisture barrier.

DOT AND KEY Barrier repair + hydrating Gentle Face Wash With Probiotic, Ceramide Face Wash for normal skin that Cleanses Skin From Dirt &Oil for Unisex it is Ultra Mild Cleanser Sulphate-free & soap-free.

THE FACE SHOP Rice Water Bright Foaming Face Wash for Glowing Skin, Moringa Oil for Moisturization ,Cleanser for Uneven Skin Tone. This gently, brightening cleansing foam enriched with rice extracts offers your skin a clear and even complexion.

essentials:
• Hypoallergenic
  • Fragrance-Free and Soap-Free
  • Non-Comedogenic and pH-Balanced
  • Gentle Cleansing Agents such as coco-glucoside, decyl glucoside, or sodium lauroyl sarcosinate, which effectively remove dirt without causing irritation
  • Calming Ingredients such as aloevera, chamomile, cucumber extract, or oat extract to help alleviate redness and irritation..
description:
PLUM 1% Oat & Allantoin Deep Nourish Face Gentle Cleanser With Vitamin B5 & Nourishes, Soothes & Restores Skin Barrier.

MINIMALIST Gentle Face Wash With 6% Oat Extract & Hyaluronic Acid For Sensitive Skin Formulated with sulfate free to provide optimum cleaning without causing dryness or irritation.

essentials:
• Oil free formulations
  • Look for ingredients like salicylic acid, glycolic acid, benzoyl peroxide, or tea tree oil.
  • Use gel-based facewashes/Cleansers
  • Stay away from harsh ingredients like alcohol or fragrances
description:
Minimalist 2% Salicylic Acid Face Wash For Oily Skin | Sulphate free, Anti Acne Face Cleanser With LHA & ZincMULTI LEVEL CLEANSING: Formulated with Capryloyl Salicylic Acid (LHA), which stays on outer layer of skin and provides gentle exfoliation, revealing soft skin, while Salicylic Acid penetrates deep into pores and reduces sebum and oil production.

Cetaphil Oily Skin Cleanser , Daily Face Wash for Oily, Acne prone skin Skin Replenishes skin lipids and moisturises the skin and it is pH balanced, Deep Cleansing without feeling dry

skin_type: Combination(Oily at T junction and Dry at cheeks)
essentials:
• Look for a gentle, pH-balanced cleanser
  • Choose a gel or foaming cleanser
  • Avoid harsh ingredients like sulfates,alcohol,fragrances, as they can irritate skin
  • Consider dual-action cleansers
description:
Plum Chamomile & White Tea Revival Face Wash. Cleanse your skin and revive it at the same time with this SLS-free, mild foaming face wash for combination skin that is enriched with soothing chamomile, rejuvenating white tea and antioxidant-rich botanical extracts.

Simple Kind To Skin Refreshing Facial Wash 150 ml ,100% Soap-Free Facewash that doesn't dry out your skin, simple Refreshing Facewash is a gentle yet effective gel cleanser that thoroughly washes away make-up, dirt.
